verses.verse: Therefore<WG1352> you are<WG1488> inexcusable<WG379>, O<WG5599> man<WG444>, whoever you are<WG3956> that judges<WG2919>: for<WG1063> where<WG1722><WG99999> you judge<WG2919> another<WG2087>, you condemn<WG2632> yourself<WG4572>; for<WG1063> you<WG846> that judge<WG2919> do the same things<WG4238>.
But<WG1161> we are sure<WG1492> that<WG3754> the judgment<WG2917> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> according to<WG2596> truth<WG225> against<WG1909> them which commit<WG4238> such things<WG5108>.

And<WG1161> do you<WG3049> think this<WG5124>, O<WG5599> man<WG444>, that judge<WG2919> them which do<WG4238> such things<WG5108>, and<WG2532> do<WG4160> the same<WG846>, that<WG3754> you<WG4771> shall escape<WG1628> the judgment<WG2917> of God<WG2316>?

Or<WG2228> do you<WG2706> despise the riches<WG4149> of his<WG846> goodness<WG5544> and<WG2532> forbearance<WG463> and<WG2532> longsuffering<WG3115>; not knowing<WG50> that<WG3754> the goodness<WG5543> of God<WG2316> leads<WG71> you<WG4571> to<WG1519> repentance<WG3341>?

But<WG1161> after<WG2596> your<WG4675> hardness<WG4643> and<WG2532> impenitent<WG279> heart<WG2588> treasures up<WG2343> to yourself<WG4572> wrath<WG3709> against<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of wrath<WG3709> and<WG2532> revelation<WG602> of the righteous judgment<WG1341> of God<WG2316>;
Who<WG3739> will render<WG591> to every man<WG1538> according to<WG2596> his<WG846> deeds<WG2041>:

To them<WG3588> who by<WG2596> patience continue<WG5281> in well<WG18> doing<WG2041> seek for<WG2212> glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> immortality<WG861>, eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>:

But<WG1161> to them<WG3588> that are contentious<WG2052>, and<WG2532> do not obey<WG544> the truth<WG225>, but<WG1161> obey<WG3982> unrighteousness<WG93>, indignation<WG2372> and<WG2532> wrath<WG3709>,

Tribulation<WG2347> and<WG2532> anguish<WG4730>, upon<WG1909> every<WG3956> soul<WG5590> of man<WG444> that does<WG2716> evil<WG2556>, to the Jew<WG2453> first<WG4412>, and<WG5037> also<WG2532> to the Gentile<WG1672>;

But<WG1161> glory<WG2532>, honor<WG5092>, and<WG2532> peace<WG1515>, to every man<WG3956> that works<WG2038> good<WG18>, to the Jew<WG2453> first<WG4412>, and<WG5037> also<WG2532> to the Gentile<WG1672>:
For<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> respect of persons<WG4382> with<WG3844> God<WG2316>.

For<WG1063> as many as<WG3745> have sinned<WG264> without law<WG460> shall<WG622> also<WG2532> perish<WG622> without law<WG460>: and<WG2532> as many as<WG3745> have sinned<WG264> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551> shall be judged<WG2919> by<WG1223> the law<WG3551>;
(For<WG1063> not<WG3756> the hearers<WG202> of the law<WG3551> are just<WG1342> before<WG3844> God<WG2316>, but<WG235> the doers<WG4163> of the law<WG3551> shall be justified<WG1344>.

For<WG1063> when<WG3752> the Gentiles<WG1484>, which have<WG2192> not<WG3361> the law<WG3551>, do<WG4160> by nature<WG5449> the things<WG3588> contained in the law<WG3551>, these<WG3778>, having<WG2192> not<WG3361> the law<WG3551>, are<WG1526> a law<WG3551> unto themselves<WG1438>:

Which<WG3748> show<WG1731> the work<WG2041> of the law<WG3551> written<WG1123> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588>, their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> also bearing witness<WG4828>, and<WG2532> their thoughts<WG3053> meanwhile<WG3342> accusing<WG2723> or else<WG2228><WG99999> excusing<WG626> one another<WG240>;)
In<WG1722> the day<WG2250> when<WG3753> God<WG2316> shall judge<WG2919> the secrets<WG2927> of men<WG444> by<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> according to<WG2596> my<WG3450> gospel<WG2098>.
Behold<WG1492>, you<WG4771> are called<WG2028> a Jew<WG2453>, and<WG2532> rest<WG1879> in the law<WG3551>, and<WG2532> make your boast<WG2744> of<WG1722> God<WG2316>,
And<WG2532> know<WG1097> his will<WG2307>, and<WG2532> approve<WG1381> the things that are more excellent<WG1308>, being instructed<WG2727> out of<WG1537> the law<WG3551>;
And<WG5037> are confident that<WG3982> you yourself<WG4572> are<WG1511> a guide<WG3595> of the blind<WG5185>, a light<WG5457> of them<WG3588> which are in<WG1722> darkness<WG4655>,
A instructor<WG3810> of the foolish<WG878>, a teacher<WG1320> of babes<WG3516>, which have<WG2192> the form<WG3446> of knowledge<WG1108> and<WG2532> of the truth<WG225> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551>.

You<WG3588> therefore<WG3767> which teach<WG1321> another<WG2087>, teach you<WG1321> not<WG3756> yourself<WG4572>? you that preach<WG2784> a man should not<WG3361> steal<WG2813>, do you steal<WG2813>?
You that say<WG3004> a man should not<WG3361> commit adultery<WG3431>, do you commit adultery<WG3431>? you that abhor<WG948> idols<WG1497>, do you commit sacrilege<WG2416>?
You that<WG3739> make your boast<WG2744> of<WG1722> the law<WG3551>, through<WG1223> breaking<WG3847> the law<WG3551> dishonor<WG818> God<WG2316>?
For<WG1063> the name<WG3686> of God<WG2316> is blasphemed<WG987> among<WG1722> the Nations<WG1484> through<WG1223> you<WG5209>, as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>.

For<WG1063> circumcision<WG4061> truly<WG3303> profits<WG5623>, if<WG1437> you keep<WG4238> the law<WG3551>: but<WG1161> if<WG1437> you be<WG1510> a breaker<WG3848> of the law<WG3551>, your<WG4675> circumcision<WG4061> is made<WG1096> uncircumcision<WG203>.

Therefore<WG3767> if<WG1437> the uncircumcision<WG203> keep<WG5442> the righteousness<WG1345> of the law<WG3551>, shall not<WG3780> his<WG846> uncircumcision<WG203> be counted<WG3049> for<WG1519> circumcision<WG4061>?

And<WG2532> shall not<WG2919> uncircumcision<WG203> which is by<WG1537> nature<WG5449>, if it fulfill<WG5055> the law<WG3551>, judge<WG2919> you<WG4571>, who<WG3588> by<WG1223> the letter<WG1121> and<WG2532> circumcision<WG4061> do transgress<WG3848> the law<WG3551>?

For<WG1063> he<WG3588> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> a Jew<WG2453>, which is one<WG3588><WG99999> outwardly<WG5318>; neither<WG3761> is that circumcision<WG1722>, which is outward<WG5318> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561>:

But<WG235> he<WG3588> is a Jew<WG2453>, which is one<WG3588><WG99999> inwardly<WG2927>; and<WG2532> circumcision<WG4061> is that of the heart<WG2588>, in<WG1722> the spirit<WG4151>, and not<WG3756> in the letter<WG1121>; whose<WG3739> praise<WG1868> is not<WG3756> of<WG1537> men<WG444>, but<WG235> of<WG1537> God<WG2316>.
